<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>SLX RITM Genérico Agent</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {

 var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
    var identifier  = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "number");
    var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "short_description");
    var status      = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "state");

    var deepLinkGenerator = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator("agent"); //agent
    var link = '';
 

 link = deepLinkGenerator.getFormScreenLink("7516f9d787232300e0ef0cf888cb0b4d", current.getTableName(), current.getValue("sys_id"));
  

    var json = {};
    json = {
        "aps": {
            "sound": "default"
        },
        "Link": link,
        "Layout": {
            "Status": status,
            "Identifier": identifier,
   "Description": description   
        }
    };

    return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.cj</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-02 22:07:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>b91ff5cd1b8390104ce9dce8bc4bcb06</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX RITM Genérico Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Agent" source="x_rrc_itsm_agent">51d094491b8f50104ce9dce8bc4bcbf5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITSM Agent">51d094491b8f50104ce9dce8bc4bcbf5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_b91ff5cd1b8390104ce9dce8bc4bcb06</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.cj</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-02 22:07:57</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
